00051       function                _get_package_relative_path( $File )
00052       {
00053             global      $PackageRelativePathCache;
00054             if( isset( $PackageRelativePathCache[ $File ] ) )
00055             {
00056                   return( $PackageRelativePathCache[ $File ] );
00057             }
00058             
00059             $RelativePath = '';           
00060             $Dir = dirname( $File );
00061             do
00062             {
00063                   $RelativePath = '/packages/'.basename( $Dir ).$RelativePath;
00064                   $Dir = dirname( dirname( $Dir ) );
00065             }
00066             while( file_exists( $Dir.'/../../packages/core/data/package_list' ) );
00067             
00068             global      $PackageRelativePathCacheChanged;
00069             $PackageRelativePathCacheChanged = true;
00070 
00071             return( $PackageRelativePathCache[ $File ] = '.'.$RelativePath );
00072       }

00075       $PackageRealVersionCache = array();

00108       function                _get_package_real_version( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR )
00109       {
00110             try
00111             {
00112                   global      $PackageRealVersionCache;
00113                   
00114                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion $ROOT_DIR";
00115                   
00116                   if( isset( $PackageRealVersionCache[ $Key ] ) === false )
00117                   {
00118                         $TmpPackageName = $PackageName.'.';
00121                         $File = _file_get_contents( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' );
00122                         if( $File === false )
00123                         {
00124                               throw( 
00125                                     new Exception( 
00126                                           'An error occured while loading file '.$ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' 
00127                                     )
00128                               );
00129                         }
00130 
00131                         $File = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $File );
00132                         $File = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $File );
00133                         $PackagesInfo = explode( "\n" , $File );
00134                         
00135                         if( $PackageVersion === 'last' )
00136                         {
00140                               $PackageDirectory = '';
00141                               
00142                               $SelectedVersion = array( '0' , '0' , '0' );
00143                               
00144                               foreach( $PackagesInfo as $pi )
00145                               {
00146                                     if( $pi[ 0 ] === $TmpPackageName[ 0 ] && strpos( $pi , $TmpPackageName ) === 0 )
00147                                     {
00148                                           $SinglePackageInfo = explode( '#' , $pi );
00151                                           $TmpVersion = explode( 
00152                                                 '.' , str_replace( $TmpPackageName , '' , $SinglePackageInfo[ 0 ] )
00153                                           );
00154 
00157                                           if( $TmpVersion[ 0 ] > $SelectedVersion[ 0 ] || 
00158                                                 ( $TmpVersion[ 0 ] == $SelectedVersion[ 0 ] && 
00159                                                   $TmpVersion[ 1 ] > $SelectedVersion[ 1 ] ) || 
00160                                                 ( $TmpVersion[ 0 ] == $SelectedVersion[ 0 ] && 
00161                                                   $TmpVersion[ 1 ] == $SelectedVersion[ 1 ] && 
00162                                                   $TmpVersion[ 2 ] > $SelectedVersion[ 2 ] ) )
00163                                           {
00164                                                 $SelectedVersion = $TmpVersion;
00165                                                 $PackageDirectory = $SinglePackageInfo[ 1 ];
00166                                                 break;
00167                                           }
00168                                     }
00169                               }
00170                               
00171                               $PackageVersion = implode( '.' , $SelectedVersion );
00172                               if( $PackageDirectory === '' )
00173                               {
00176                                     throw( new Exception( 'Package '.$TmpPackageName.$PackageVersion.' was not found' ) );
00177                               }
00178                         }
00179                         
00180                         global      $PackageRealVersionCacheChanged;
00181                         $PackageRealVersionCacheChanged = true;
00182                         $PackageRealVersionCache[ $Key ] = $PackageVersion;
00183                   }
00184                   
00185                   return( $PackageRealVersionCache[ $Key ] );
00186             }
00187             catch( Exception $e )
00188             {
00189                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00190             }
00191       }

00226       function                _get_package_path( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR )
00227       {
00228             try
00229             {
00230                   global      $PackagePathCacheChanged;
00231                   global      $PackagePathCache;
00232                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion $ROOT_DIR";
00233                   
00234                   if( isset( $PackagePathCache[ $Key ] ) === false )
00235                   {
00238                         $PackageName = explode( '::' , $PackageName );
00239                         $PackageName = array_pop( $PackageName );
00240                         
00243                         $PackageVersion = explode( '::' , $PackageVersion );
00244                         $PackageVersion = array_pop( $PackageVersion );
00245                         
00246                         $File = _file_get_contents( $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list' );
00247                         if( $File === false )
00248                         {
00249                               throw( 
00250                                     new Exception( 
00251                                           'An error occured while loading file '.$ROOT_DIR.'/packages/core/data/package_list'
00252                                     )
00253                               );
00254                         }
00255                         $File = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $File );
00256                         $File = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $File );
00257                         $PackagesInfo = explode( "\n" , $File );
00258                         
00259                         $PackageVersion = _get_package_real_version( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR );
00260                         
00263                         $PackageDirectory = '';
00264                         $PackageNameAndVersion = $PackageName.'.'.$PackageVersion;
00265                         foreach( $PackagesInfo as $pi )
00266                         {
00267                               if( $pi[ 0 ] === $PackageNameAndVersion[ 0 ] && strpos( $pi , $PackageNameAndVersion ) === 0 )
00268                               {
00269                                     $SinglePackageInfo = explode( '#' , $pi );
00270                                     $PackagePathCacheChanged = true;
00271                                     $PackagePathCache[ $Key ] = $ROOT_DIR.'/packages/'.$SinglePackageInfo[ 1 ];
00272                                     
00273                                     return( $PackagePathCache[ $Key ] );
00274                               }
00275                         }
00276                         
00277                         throw( new Exception( 'Package '.$PackageName. ' with version '.$PackageVersion.' was not found' ) );
00278                   }
00279                   else
00280                   {
00281                         return( $PackagePathCache[ $Key ] );
00282                   }
00283             }
00284             catch( Exception $e )
00285             {
00286                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00287             }
00288       }

00323       function                _get_root_dir( $thePackageName , $thePackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR = INSTALL_DIR )
00324       {
00325             try
00326             {
00327                   global $RootDirCacheChanged , $RootDirCache;
00328                   $Key = "$thePackageName $thePackageVersion $ROOT_DIR";
00329                   
00330                   if( isset( $RootDirCache[ $Key ] ) == false )
00331                   {
00332                         $PackageNames = explode( '::' , $thePackageName );
00333                         $PackageVersions = explode( '::' , $thePackageVersion );
00334                         $PackageName = substr_replace( $thePackageName , '' , 0 , strlen( $PackageNames[ 0 ] ) + 2 );
00335                         $PackageVersion = substr_replace( $thePackageVersion , '', 0 , strlen( $PackageVersions[ 0 ] ) + 2 );
00336                         $PackagePath = _get_package_path( 
00337                               $PackageNames[ 0 ] , 
00338                               _get_package_real_version( $PackageNames[ 0 ] , $PackageVersions[ 0 ] , $ROOT_DIR ) , $ROOT_DIR
00339                         );
00340                         
00341                         $RootDirCacheChanged = true;
00342                         $RootDirCache[ $Key ] = $PackageName == '' ? $ROOT_DIR : _get_root_dir( 
00343                               $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackagePath
00344                         );
00345                   }
00346                   
00347                   return( $RootDirCache[ $Key ] );
00348             }
00349             catch( Exception $e )
00350             {
00351                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00352             }
00353       }

00388       function                _get_full_class_name( $TopPackageName , $Version , $ROOT_DIR )
00389       {
00390             try
00391             {     
00392                   global      $FullClassNameCache;
00393                   if( isset( $FullClassNameCache[ "$TopPackageName.$Version.$ROOT_DIR" ] ) )
00394                   {
00395                         return( $FullClassNameCache[ "$TopPackageName.$Version.$ROOT_DIR" ] );
00396                   }
00397                   
00398                   $TopVersion = explode( '::' , $Version );
00399                   $TopVersion = array_pop( $TopVersion );
00400                   
00401                   $RealPackageVersion = _get_package_real_version( $TopPackageName , $TopVersion , $ROOT_DIR );
00402                   
00403                   $PackageClassName = str_replace( '.' , '_' , $TopPackageName.'_'.$RealPackageVersion );
00404                   
00405                   global      $FullClassNameCacheChanged;
00406                   $FullClassNameCacheChanged = true;
00407                   
00408                   return( $FullClassNameCache[ "$TopPackageName.$Version.$ROOT_DIR" ] = $PackageClassName );
00409             }
00410             catch( Exception $e )
00411             {
00412                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00413             }
00414       }

00560       function                _get_package_info_after_rewrites( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath = false )
00561       {
00562             try
00563             {
00564                   global      $RewritesCache;
00565                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion $PackageScriptPath";
00566                   
00567                   if( isset( $RewritesCache[ $Key ] ) )
00568                   {
00569                         return( $RewritesCache[ $Key ] );
00570                   }
00571                   
00572                   $PackageVersion = _make_full_version( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00573                   
00574                   global      $ENABLE_REWRITES;
00575                   if( $ENABLE_REWRITES )
00576                   {
00577                         list( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) = _apply_rewrites( 
00578                               $PackageName , 
00579                               $PackageVersion , 
00580                               $PackageScriptPath 
00581                         );
00582                         
00583                         global      $RewritesCacheChanged;
00584                         $RewritesCacheChanged = true;
00585                   }
00586                   
00587                   return( $RewritesCache[ $Key ] = array( 0 => $PackageName , 1 => $PackageVersion ) );
00588             }
00589             catch( Exception $e )
00590             {
00591                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00592             }
00593       }

00626       {

00628             {
00629                   list( $PackageName , $PackageRealVersion ) = _get_package_info_after_rewrites(

00631                   );
00632                   
00633                   $ROOT_DIR = _get_root_dir( $PackageName , $PackageRealVersion , INSTALL_DIR );
00634                   
00635                   return( _get_package_path( $PackageName , $PackageRealVersion , $ROOT_DIR ) );

00676       function                _get_load_script_data( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath )
00677       {
00678             try
00679             {
00680                   $RootDirectory = _get_root_dir( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , INSTALL_DIR );
00681                   $PackageDirectory = _get_package_path( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $RootDirectory );
00682                   $TopPackageName = _get_top_package_name( $PackageName );
00683                   
00684                   $PackageClassName = 'unexisting_class';
00685                   $Exists = false;
00686                   
00687                   if( file_exists( $PackageDirectory.'/'.$TopPackageName.'.php' ) )
00688                   {
00689                         $PackageClassName = _get_full_class_name( $TopPackageName , $PackageVersion , $RootDirectory );
00690                         $Exists = true;
00691                   }
00692                   
00693                   return( 
00694                         array( $PackageDirectory.'/'.$TopPackageName.'.php' , $Exists , $PackageClassName , $TopPackageName )
00695                   );
00696             }
00697             catch( Exception $e )
00698             {
00699                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00700             }
00701       }

00729       function                _fill_package_paths_cache( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath )
00730       {
00731             try
00732             {
00733                   global            $ObjectLabel;
00734                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion $ObjectLabel";
00735                   
00736                   global            $PackagePathsCache;
00737                   if( isset( $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ] ) )return;
00738                   
00739                   list( $RPackageName , $RPackageVersion ) = _get_package_info_after_rewrites( 
00740                         $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath
00741                   );
00742                   
00743                   list( $ScriptPath , $Exists , $PackageClassName , $TopPackageName ) = _get_load_script_data( 
00744                         $RPackageName , $RPackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath 
00745                   );
00746 
00747                   $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ] = array( 
00748                         'path' => $ScriptPath , 'exists' => $Exists , 
00749                         'class_name' => $PackageClassName , 'top_package_name' => $TopPackageName
00750                   );
00751                   
00752                   global            $PackagePathsCacheChanged;
00753                   $PackagePathsCacheChanged = true;
00754             }
00755             catch( Exception $e )
00756             {
00757                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00758             }
00759       }

00791       function                _try_fetch_from_cache( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )
00792       {
00793             try
00794             {
00795                   global            $ObjectLabel;
00796                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion $ObjectLabel";
00797                   
00798                   global            $PackagePathsCache;
00799                   if( isset( $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ] ) )
00800                   {
00801                         global            $PackageCache;
00802                         if( isset( $PackageCache[ $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ][ 'path' ] ] ) )
00803                         {
00804                               global            $RequestedClassName;
00805                               $RequestedClassName = $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ][ 'class_name' ];
00806                               
00807                               return( array( true , $PackageCache[ $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ][ 'path' ] ] ) );
00808                         }
00809                   }
00810                   
00811                   return( array( false , false ) );
00812             }
00813             catch( Exception $e )
00814             {
00815                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00816             }
00817       }

00845       function                _package_script_fast_load( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )
00846       {
00847             try
00848             {
00849                   /* на этом этапе мы уже знаем где лежит пакет $PackageName.$PackageVersion */
00850                   global            $ObjectLabel;
00851                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion $ObjectLabel";
00852             
00853                   global            $PackagePathsCache;
00854                   $PackageInfo = $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ];
00855                   
00856                   if( $PackageInfo[ 'exists' ] )
00857                   {
00858                         require_once( $PackageInfo[ 'path' ] );
00859 
00860                         $RootDirectory = _get_root_dir( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , INSTALL_DIR );
00861                         
00862                         return( _get_full_class_name( $PackageInfo[ 'top_package_name' ] , $PackageVersion , $RootDirectory ) );
00863                   }
00864                   else
00865                   {
00866                         return( 'unexisting_class' );
00867                   }
00868             }
00869             catch( Exception $e )
00870             {
00871                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00872             }
00873       }

00901       function                _get_package_directory( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )
00902       {
00903             try
00904             {
00905                   $RootDirectory = _get_root_dir( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , INSTALL_DIR );
00906                   $PackageDirectory = _get_package_path( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $RootDirectory );
00907                   $TopPackageName = _get_top_package_name( $PackageName );
00908                   
00909                   return( $PackageDirectory );
00910             }
00911             catch( Exception $e )
00912             {
00913                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00914             }

00939       function                _store_package_object( $PackageClassName , $Key )
00940       {
00941             try
00942             {
00943                   global            $PackageCache;
00944                   if( isset( $PackageCache[ $Key ] ) === false )
00945                   {
00946                         global            $RequestedClassName;
00947                         $RequestedClassName = false;
00948                         $PackageCache[ $Key ] = false;
00949                         if( class_exists( $PackageClassName ) )
00950                         {
00951                               $PackageCache[ $Key ] = new $PackageClassName();
00952                               $RequestedClassName = $PackageClassName;
00953                         }
00954                   }
00955                   global            $PackagePathsCache;
00956                   if( isset( $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ] ) )
00957                   {
00958                         $PackageInfo = $PackagePathsCache[ $Key ];
00959                         if( isset( $PackageCache[ $PackageInfo[ 'path' ] ] ) === false )
00960                         {
00961                               $PackageCache[ $PackageInfo[ 'path' ] ] = $PackageCache[ $Key ];
00962                         }
00963                   }
00964                   else
00965                   {
00966                         throw( new Exception( "The path for key $Key does not exist" ) );
00967                   }
00968             }
00969             catch( Exception $e )
00970             {
00971                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00972             }
00973       }

00997       function                _store_package_path( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )
00998       {
00999             try
01000             {
01001                   $PackageDirectory = _get_package_directory( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
01002                   
01003                   global            $LoadedPackagesPaths;
01004                   $LoadedPackagesPaths [ "$PackageName.$PackageVersion" ] = array( 
01005                         'directory' => $PackageDirectory , 'package_name' => $PackageName , 'package_version' => $PackageVersion
01006                   );
01007             }
01008             catch( Exception $e )
01009             {
01010                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
01011             }
01012       }
